metadata.title: CVE-2022-32892 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: An access issue was addressed with improvements to the sandbox. This issueis fixed in Safari 16, iOS 15.7 and iPadOS 15.7, iOS 16, macOS Ventura 13.A sandboxed process may be able to circumvent sandbox restrictions.

criterions.comment: qtwebkit-opensource-src package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
wpewebkit package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
